ride_ask_booking_number: Could you provide your booking ID, please?
ask_name: May I have your name, please?
ride_provide_booking_status: Your driver will be with you in about {minutes_till_pickup:d} minutes.
anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you check that status of your ride.
